summary: Shao Jun from Assasin's Creed series...
descriptionHtml:
[color=#ff0000][size=4] [/size][size=4]-TOOLS-[/size]
[/color]
SKSE: http://skse.silverlock.org/
SkyUI: http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/3863/?
RaceMenu Mod: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/29624//?
ShowRaceMenu Precache Killer- http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/33526/? (For any problem)
Hair: LovelyHairStyles- http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/7403/?
Brows: Brows- http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/30411/?

PS:For armor just google it.There is 1 Steam link and 1 armor compilation link under the Steam link...

[color=#ff0000][size=5]Instructions:[/size][/color]
After downloading and installing all mods mentioned above.
Follow these steps:
1. Download my mod and install it at data/skse/plugins/chargen/presets
2. Open Skyrim using SKSE
3. Load any working save file
4. Open the console
5. Type showracemenu
6. Select the Breton Race
7. Look for the slide option "preset slot"
8. Press F9 and done

[color=#0000ff][size=6]ENJOY!![/size][/color]
author: RolloTheBerserker
